text: Faris Zubanović (born 12 June 2000) is a Bosnian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Turkish club Tuzlaspor.FREMAD KØBER EFTERTRAGTET BOSNISK ANGRIBER, fremadamagerelite.dk, 5 July 2019 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|class=wikitable style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Željezničar |2018–19 |Bosnian Premier League |1||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- |Fremad Amager |2019–20 |Danish 1st Division |11||1||0||0||colspan=2|—||11||1 |- !colspan=3|Career total !12!!1!!0!!0!!colspan=2|—!!12!!1 |} ==Personal life== Faris is the son of Željezničar club legend Hadis Zubanović. ==References== ==External links== *Faris Zubanović at Sofascore Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Sarajevo Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina players Category:Danish 1st Division players Category:FK Željezničar players Category:Fremad Amager players Category:Association football forwards
title: Faris Zubanović
